nodes.text: The Sienar labs at Anxarta Spaceport was a location on the planet Lianna that, along with the restricted Sienar Fleet Systems special projects area at the Santhe/Sienar Technologies Corporate Headquarters on Lianna, had access to a private database of Sienar Fleet Systems at the time of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's war against the Galactic Empire after the Battle of Yavin.
